title: Finely Designed space. Extra office. Serene area, Sun, yard, whole 9 !
posting_body: Down this green cul de sac, near to both the center and Waverley Sq., ie--walking distance to many attractions, prepare to find this diamond in the rough.
Bit edgy perhaps on the exterior, smaller office or 3rd br, and overall it’s not much over 1000sf.
All that is a small price per the superb & contemporary design we find at this gem of a lay out.
New-er finishes in all corners... and a full slate of appliances, even space for a breakfast table--all make up this borderline gourmet level kitchen.
New double sealed vinyl windows keep the heat in where it's supposed to be.
Elongated and fireplaced living room will excite the senses.
Great natural light puts an exclamation point.
Closet space is more than adequate plus the basement offers eons of storage.
Deck and a very green yard complete the picture here, a centerpiece.
This is the upper slice of good looking 2fam.
Images are of the sister unit below as a model.
